name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: ha.health-monitor.rpc.connect.max.retries
description:
The number of retries on connect error when establishing RPC proxy
    connection to NameNode, used for monitorHealth() calls.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.shuffle.log.limit.kb
description:
Maximum size of the syslog.shuffle file in kilobytes
    (0 for no limit).

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.job.task.listener.thread-count
description:
The number of threads used to handle RPC calls in the
    MR AppMaster from remote tasks

name: hadoop.security.uid.cache.secs
description:
This is the config controlling the validity of the entries in the cache
        containing the userId to userName and groupId to groupName used by
        NativeIO getFstat().

name: dfs.namenode.top.window.num.buckets
description: Number of buckets in the rolling window implementation of nntop
